code: import{useState}from"react";import{updateAccount}from"../api";import Account from"../components/Account";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Withdraw(_ref){let{allAccounts,getAllAccounts}=_ref;const[error,setError]=useState("");const handleDeposit=async(value,balance,id)=>{const withdraw=parseFloat(value);const parsedBalance=parseFloat(balance);const total=parsedBalance-withdraw;if(total<0){setError("No enough founds");}else{setError("");await updateAccount(id,total.toFixed(2));getAllAccounts();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Account,{title:"Withdraw",buttonText:"Withdraw",inputLabel:"Withdraw Amount",onSubmit:handleDeposit,allAccounts:allAccounts,error:error});}
